for t in range(int(input())):
 a,b,c=list(map(int,input().split()))
 l=[]
 l.append(a)
 l.append(b)
 l.append(c)
 l.sort()
 if(l[2]<=((l[0]+l[1])+1)):
  print("Yes")
 else:
  print("No")

# cook your dish here
n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
 li = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
 print('Yes' if sum(li) - max(li) >= max(li) else 'No')
